uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model

Class StudyVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.IndexedElement
      • uk.ac.ebi.pride.jmztab.model.StudyVariable

  • public class StudyVariable
extends IndexedElement
    The variables about which the final results of a study are reported, which may have been derived following averaging across a group of replicate measurements (assays). In files where assays are reported, study variables have references to assays. The same concept has been defined by others as "experimental factor".
    Since:
    23/05/13
    Author:
    qingwei

    • Method Detail

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        A textual description of the study variable. study_variable[1-n]-description

      • getAssayMap

        public SortedMap<Integer,Assay> getAssayMap()
        Comma-separated references to the IDs of assays grouped in the study variable. study_variable[1-n]-assay_refs assay[1], assay[2], assay[3]

      • getSampleMap

        public SortedMap<Integer,Sample> getSampleMap()
        Comma-separated references to the samples that were analysed in the study variable. study_variable[1-n]-sample_refs sample[1]

      • addAssay

        public void addAssay(Assay assay)
        Add a assay to study_variable[1-n]-assay_refs.
        Parameters:
        assay - SHOULD NOT set null, and have added it into Metadata.

      • addSample

        public void addSample(Sample sample)
        Add a sample to study_variable[1-n]-sample_refs.
        Parameters:
        sample - SHOULD NOT set null, and have added it into Metadata.

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription(String description)
        A textual description of the study variable.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Print study_variable[1-n] object to a string. The structure like:
        • MTD study_variable[1]-description description Group B (spike-in 0.74 fmol/uL)
        • MTD study_variable[1]-assay_refs assay[1], assay[2]
        • MTD study_variable[1]-sample_refs sample[1]
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
